title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.07.24-chakra71
description:
Thursday July 24, 2008.

Alex welcomes Dr. Ron Paul, author and researcher Jim Marrs, Bob Chapman of the International Forecaster, and economist and nationally syndicated columnist Paul Craig Roberts. 

Sourced from the 32 Kbpslive stream.  Includes content during commercials.  Commercial editing done using Nero WaveEditor 4 by hand.  Re-encoded to 32 Kbps @ 22.05 KHz.  Four hours duration before commercial edit takes it down to just over 3 hours of playing time.  

When Ron Paul was on Alex said he was going to talk behind the scenes, but apparently he didn't mean on the air because it was a normal commercial break.  I also adjusted the volume when Paul Craig Roberts was on because he was so low you could hardly hear him. <a href="
http://prisonplanet.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
